Brendan Rodgers has not disciplined Raheem Sterling or Jordon Ibe for their alleged involvement in the nitrous oxide incident, as well as a subsequent incident involving shisha pipes. Liverpool manager Rodgers would not comment on whether he would give Steven Gerrard, coming back from a three-match suspension, extra discipline.

In this aspect, Brendan Rodgers did not discipline Raheem Sterling and Jordon Ibe for their incident with nitrous oxide. He wants to draw a line and move forward, focusing on their future performances rather than past incidents.
